situation.title: COVID-Tourism
situation.meta_description: Compensation for travel bureaus, travel agencies, and tour guides.

content.processed:
1) Compensation for travel bureaus

Deadlines 

  • The validity of the call: November 2nd, 2020 - December 11th, 2020.
  • Intake of grant applications: November  11th, 2020 - December 11th, 2020.
  • Decisive period: February 20th, 2020 - October 10th,  2020.

Rules
The subsidy goes up to 2.5% of the planned revenues from the sales of tours and related travel services for 2020. The grant should be used for the service operation and/or for refunds for canceled due to pandemic in the period from February 20th, 2020 until October 10th, 2020.

More information about other conditions here.

If you have any questions about the grant, please send them to covid.kancelare@mmr.cz

2) Support for travel agencies.

Deadlines

  • The validity of the call: November 2nd, 2020 - December 11th, 2020.
  • Intake of grant applications: November  11th, 2020 - December 11th, 2020.
  • Decisive period: February 20th, 2020 - October 10th,  2020.

Subsidy types:

  1. Subsidy of CZK 500 is to cover travel agency losses for cancelled trips or health resort stays. The grant will be calculated for cancelled trips due to a pandemic in the period from 20 February 2020 to 10 October 2020. Regarding health resort stays, the bonus will only apply to spring ones which were cancelled due to the closure of the resorts.
  2. A flat-rate subsidy according to the revenue that the agency achieved in 2019. The agency must provide relevant documentation which shows more than 50% drop in revenues in 2020 and prove that agency's main activity is inbound tourism.

 

The subsidy will be paid out in these ranges: CZK 50,000, CZK 100,000, CZK 250,000 and CZK 500,000.

It is not possible to combine the two supports.

More information about other conditions here. 

If you have any questions about the grant, please send them to covid.agentury@mmr.cz

3) Tour guides support

Deadlines

 

  • The validity of the call: November 2nd, 2020 - December 11th, 2020.
  • Intake of grant applications: November  11th, 2020 - December 11th, 2020.
  • Decisive period: June 1st, 2020 - September 30th, 2020.

Rules

The guide can apply for a subsidy of CZK 50,000.

The individual must prove that:

A) he or she provides educational services to a school facility in the duration of at least ten teaching hours by 30 June 2021 at the latest. He or she will prove it to the grant provider by a work confirmation from the school principal no later than till 31 July 2021

OR

B) completes further education or a retraining course accredited by the Ministry of Education, Youth and Sports for additional employment on the labour market by 31 December 2021. He or she will present a relevant document (certificate, etc.) to the subsidy provider no later than 31 January 2022. The condition is met if its fulfilment started before the grant application - at any time during the decisive period.

If the guide does not meet at least one of the conditions above, he or she is qualified to a subsidy of CZK 40,000.

More information about other conditions here. 

If you have any questions about the grant, please send them to covid.pruvodci@mmr.cz 

Application
Electronic Application Form: http://www3.mmr.cz/zad

If you have any questions about the grant, please send them to covid.kancelare@mmr.cz.
